channel.title: CVE Feed for FasterXML -- jackson-databind
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FasterXML -- jackson-databind

item.title: CVE-2017-7525|2024-08-05T16:04:11.868Z -- fasterxml -- jackson-databind
item.description: A deserialization flaw was discovered in the jackson-databind, versions before 2.6.7.1, 2.7.9.1 and 2.8.9, which could allow an unauthenticated user to perform code execution by sending the maliciously crafted input to the readValue method of the ObjectMapper.
